basics.name: Samar D Acharya
basics.label: DevOps and Software Developer
basics.summary: Born in Nepal and currently living in Kansas, USA, Samar is a self-motivated, challenge seeker, problem solver, avid hacker, reliable and passionate individual with sharp learning curve and dedication to building highly available and reliable applications.

work.summary: Brightergy, LLC is a clean energy company with a vision to utilize technology to be able to collect vast amount of energy data and turn them into actionable intelligence. Leveraging the power of IoT, the technology team is utilizing range of platforms, programming languages, databases and cloud to build such energy platform.
highlights: Write backend api and device code in elixir and python
Lead a team of engineers to build successful cloud and device solutions
Manage cloud platform of BrighterLink, the enrgy platform including scaling, high availability, security and resilience at all level
Design the solutions and implementation details for various features

work.summary: Techgaun was a startup with focus on building local data analysis platform as a Product while sustaining itself via the outsourcing work.
highlights: Led a team of developer to build data analysis platform for local business data
Designed, implemented and delivered solutions for the clients

work.summary: Deerwalk, Inc. develops solutions for data analysis and management of US healthcare. The vast amount of data are turned into actionable insights and intelligence and used for patient care, insurance assessment, etc.
highlights: Built a highly flexible deployment environment
Implemented local dev environment with dummy data generation for several large-scale projects
Performed security assessment against various projects

volunteer.summary: The largest charitable network of Nepalis, HELP NEPAL Network: One Dollar a Month Fund for Nepal is a global charity run on a fully voluntary basis. Help Nepal Network runs a educational project with a goal of deploying one electronic library per district.
highlights: Led a team of volunteers to deploy electronic library using LTSP and provided training to the students
Developed a complete solution to automate the deployment of electronic library

volunteer.summary: I maintained and managed internet connectivity and network of more than 200 hosts in a hostel network.
highlights: Built an automated traffic shaping utility and firewall policy
Developed and implemented various network security measures for ethernet and WiFI network
